sentences.cn: ...某些州持续存在的挥霍浪费现象。

sentences.en: But United punished them for their early profligacy in the most clinical of fashion.
sentences.cn: 但是曼联用最好的方式惩罚了他们的浪费.

sentences.en: Hardest of all will be finding the political will to curb profligacy.
sentences.cn: 真正的难题是缺少对打击挥霍浪费的政治意愿.

sentences.en: Recession, they reason a penance for past profligacy.
sentences.cn: 人们把衰退的原因归结为前期挥霍的报应.

sentences.en: Recession, they reason, must be a penance for past profligacy.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退, 他们推断, 肯定是对过去大肆挥霍的赎罪.

words.tran_cn: 放荡的，不检点的；恣意挥霍的
丰富的；很多的；慷慨的；浪费的

trans.tran_en: Profligacy is the spending of too much money or the using of too much of something
